titles.title: The Lord Is Carrying Us On Eagle's Wings

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord is carrying us on eagle's wings,
And we will rise above the storm.
Not by flying away, but by overcoming,
Not just one alone, but this many-membered son.
On eagles' wings into the heavenlies,
To go down unto death, the way of the cross,
And then to rise into perfection,
Going on to the fullness of God.
